Welcome to Find My Vax Santa Clara: 欢迎来到 Find My Vax Santa Clara
A Vaccine Locator for Santa Clara County: 帮你在 Santa Clara County 找新冠病毒的预防针预约
You are eligible for vaccination if you: 十六岁以上可以打预防针!
COVID-19 vaccines are free regardless of: 不论保险或移民身份, 新冠病毒的预防针是免费的!
You will not be asked about your immigra: 你打預防針的時候不会被问你的移民身份. 如果你想知道跟多的信息, 请看 '新冠病毒預防針经常问的问题'
At this time we support the Santa Clara: 我们现在可以找到 Santa Clara 县的现场, CVS, Rite Aid, Walgreens, 和 Walmart. 我们也可以找到 Safeway 的的, 但是不能确定. 我们一直在加更多的帮助.
Loading Appointments!: 等一下! 正在加载约会!
I found a vaccine appointments at: 我在这里找到了预防针的预约
You do NOT need to be a member of Kaiser: 你不需要成为Kaiser Permanente的成员
CVS Pharmacy appointments go quickly: CVS 药房的预约很快会被预订
Rite Aid Pharmacy appointments go quickl: Rite Aid 药房的预约很快会被预订
Walgreens Pharmacy appointments go quick: Walgreens 药房的预约很快会被预订
Show Potentially Available Appointments: 表现可能有预约的地方
howToUse1: 如果你想按距离对预约进行排序，请输入邮政编码
howToUse2: 向下滚动以查看以下位置的近实时可用性 "<1>可得到的预约</1>" 然后检查是否有预约适合你的日程安排.
howToUse3: 如果找到与你的日程安排相匹配的预约，请单击相关的绿色按钮.
howToUse4: 单击链接后，将显示一个弹出窗口，其中包含其他说明和绿色的继续按钮，可转到相关站点并按照站点上的指示进行注册.
howToUse5: 如果没有预约适合你的计划，请单击 "<1>可能有预约</1>" 按钮, 然后逐个校验预约.
If you have any questions contact us at: 你有问题的话, 请通过以下方式与我们联系
about1: Find My Vax Santa Clara 是主要网页 <1>Find My Vax LA</1> 的分枝. 我们主要的目是帮 Santa Clara 县居民收到新冠病毒疫苗通过集中接种疫苗.
about2: 项目是由 <1>Daniel Budziwojski</1> 和 <3> Jessica Li </3> 合伙跟 <5> Andrew Friedman </5> 从主要网站 Find My Vax LA 完成的.
about3: Aishwarya Atmakuri 和 Michelle Lum 也提供了额外的帮助.
about4: Find My Vax Santa Clara 已出现在下面的新闻上. 媒体查询，请给我们发电子邮件在 <1> press@findmyvaxsc.com </1> 或者直接在 <4> Twitter </4> 跟我们联系.
donate1: 考虑捐助在我们名下给现有的慈善机构:
contact1: 你有问题的话, 请通过以下方式与我们联系:
resources0: Have questions or want additional information or resources on the COVID-19 vaccine? Read below for more.
resources1Title1: Where You Can Get Vaccinated in Santa Clara County
resources1Subtitle1: Santa Clara County Official Vaccination Sites
contactNotes: Note: Only call if you NEED to! Wait times might be long, and we do not want to overwhelm the already-overwhelmed call system!
locationNotes: Note: If you are 16 or 17 years old, you can only get vaccinated at <1>Levis Stadium, Fairgrounds Expo Hall, Gilroy High School, and Mountain View Community Center</1>
pharamacyTip: Tip: For CVS, appointments are generally added from 12am to 1am
resources1Subtitle3: Local Hospitals (Call if you’re not a patient, you may need to create an account)
hospitalNotes: Note: Other hospitals may have vaccines, but availability may be low
resources2Subtitle1: Santa Clara County COVID-19 Vaccine FAQs
resources2Subtitle2: Scheduling a COVID Vaccine Appointment in the Bay Area
resources3Item2Caption: Sign up to have someone book your appointment
resources3Item3Title: VTA Info on Transportation to Vaccination Sites:
resources3Item3Caption: Free transportation options to vaccination sites and bus route information
resources3Item4Caption: Get notifications about pharmacy appointments on your email or phone
